definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

pinyin: wo1 lun2 pen1 qi4 fa1 dong4 ji1
wo1 lun2 zhou2 fa1 dong4 ji1

sentences.english: The critical speed of one turbopump rotor on elastic support was computed by FEMQZ.
sentences.chinese: 计算分析了某涡轮泵转子在弹性支承下的临界转速。

sentences.english: The flow field in low pressure turbine guide vane was simulated by third order accuracy Godunov scheme with TVD property.
sentences.chinese: 求解了某型航空发动机的低压涡轮导向器内流场。

sentences.english: An airplane with such an engine.
sentences.chinese: 涡轮喷气发动机推动的飞机。

sentences.english: The new engine uses turbocharging, which forces air through it.
sentences.chinese: 新发动机采用了涡轮增压技术，迫使空气进入发动机。

sentences.english: In China, some aero-engines start to use single crystal turbine blades in practice.
sentences.chinese: 在国内，某些发动机上亦开始使用单晶涡轮转子叶片。

sentences.english: The moist fuel gas from the drying operation is combusted to drive the turbine.
sentences.chinese: 从操作的干燥潮湿气体燃料燃烧来驱动涡轮机。

sentences.english: Chinese wind-turbine makers are starting to export.
sentences.chinese: 中国的风力涡轮机开始进行出口。

sentences.english: A wind turbine requires at least an acre of property as well as other location criteria.
sentences.chinese: 一个符合标准的风流涡轮机至少需要一英亩的地方。

sentences.english: Network marketing is the powerful engine turbo-driving this skyward trend.
sentences.chinese: 网络营销是强大引擎涡轮驾驶这矗立趋势。

sentences.english: Test specimen has been designed and manufactured and a counter-rotating turbine test rig has also been constructed.
sentences.chinese: 设计制造出了试验件，建立了对转涡轮试验台。

sentences.english: Faster than a turbo-powered broomstick, Harry Potter has started flying off the shelves.
sentences.chinese: 哈利波特开始飞下书架，速度比涡轮驱动的扫帚还快。

sentences.english: The top-level design of micro turbine Jet-engine is presented in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 对微型涡轮喷气发动机的顶层设计问题进行了研究。

sentences.english: This is mainly caused by the lagging of the turbocharger.
sentences.chinese: 这主要是由于涡轮增压器的滞后所致。

sentences.english: The engine-feed system interface is at the turbopump inlet flanges .
sentences.chinese: 发动机与供应系统的交界是在涡轮泵的进口法兰盘处。

sentences.english: Denmark is home to the world's largest wind turbine manufacturer, Vestas.
sentences.chinese: 丹麦是世界最大风力涡轮机制造商维斯塔斯的家乡。

sentences.english: The engine is equipped with one turbocharger per cylinder bank.
sentences.chinese: 引擎被装备每气缸焖火一个涡轮增压器。

definition: angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
